title: Poll Types
description: Understand the four poll types and when to use each

content.text: Askify supports four distinct poll types, each designed for specific use cases. Choose the right type based on how you want your team to respond.
Voters select exactly one option. Perfect for decisions where only one choice makes sense.

items: Team decisions with mutually exclusive options
Preference polls (e.g., 'Which design do you prefer?')
Scheduling (e.g., 'Best time for the meeting?')

content.text: Voters can select multiple options. Each option tracks its vote count independently.

items: Gathering multiple inputs (e.g., 'Which features should we prioritize?')
Interest checks (e.g., 'Which topics interest you?')
Availability polls (e.g., 'Which days work for you?')

content.text: Click any star rating to vote. The poll shows both individual vote counts and the calculated average.
Choose your poll type based on the response format:

items: Single Choice: One option, mutually exclusive
Multi-Select: Multiple options, independent selections
Yes/No/Maybe: Quick consensus, pre-set options
Rating Scale: Numeric feedback, shows average
